rows.label: bf05010100_0010
rows.name:
Amazing, Laura. Even when I foresee 
your movements, you counter me instantly.

rows.label: bf05010100_0020
rows.name: It's all thanks to [System:Ruby rt=Kasumi ]Second Blade[/System:Ruby] power!

rows.label: bf05010100_0030
rows.name:
What about you? I don't see you
using Hikari's hidden ability!

rows.label: bf05010100_0040
rows.name: What if I did use it?

rows.label: bf05010100_0050
rows.name: In that case,

rows.label: bf05010100_0055
rows.name: I'd have to bring out "First Blade" too.

rows.label: bf05010100_0060
rows.name: Adel-sama...

rows.label: bf05010100_0070
rows.name: Your meal is ready.

rows.label: bf05010100_0080
rows.name: Oh, is it that time already?

rows.label: bf05010100_0090
rows.name:
This season has such long days,
you lose track of time, don't you?

rows.label: bf05010100_0100
rows.name:
Oh, is the training over already?
That's a shame, I wanted to join in.

rows.label: bf05010100_0110
rows.name: Join in? By yourself?

rows.label: bf05010100_0120
rows.name:
His Majesty is busy with many matters.
Besides, I often act alone.

rows.label: bf05010100_0130
rows.name:
A Driver and Blade are of one body and mind.
That's how it's supposed to be, right?

rows.label: bf05010100_0140
rows.name: You can't bring out your power otherwise.

rows.label: bf05010100_0150
rows.name: It's not so simple as all that.

rows.label: bf05010100_0152
rows.name:
I haven't been able to fully 
bring out your power yet.

rows.label: bf05010100_0160
rows.name: Really? I think I'm already giving it my all.

rows.label: bf05010100_0170
rows.name: But you never stop growing.

rows.label: bf05010100_0180
rows.name:
Still,
Kasumi's power to restrict Blades' actions

rows.label: bf05010100_0190
rows.name:
is perfect for training.
We're lucky.

rows.label: bf05010100_0200
rows.name:
When she stops me using my Foresight...
It's certainly difficult.

rows.label: bf05010100_0210
rows.name:
Adel-sama and Hikari-sama. I'm just
happy to help you both in any way I can.

rows.label: bf05010100_0220
rows.name:
Looking at you like this,
you really do look like twin sisters.

rows.label: bf05010100_0230
rows.name:
It's rare for a Driver's traits to appear
so strongly, isn't it?

rows.label: bf05010100_0240
rows.name:
People tell me that from time to time,
but is it really true?

rows.label: bf05010100_0250
rows.name: Well[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf05010100_0252
rows.name:
But I am happy to have been born 
with the same appearance as Laura-sama.

rows.label: bf05010100_0260
rows.name: We can even share clothes.

rows.label: bf05010100_0270
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf05010100_0275
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]

rows.label: bf05010100_0280
rows.name: By the way...

rows.label: bf05010100_0282
rows.name: Next, I'd like to spar with Shin.

rows.label: bf05010100_0290
rows.name: Well? How about it, Shin?

rows.label: bf05010100_0300
rows.name: I[ML:Dash ] don't particularly like fighting.

rows.label: bf05010100_0310
rows.name:
And to think we're hearing that from
"the strongest man in Iira".

rows.label: bf05010100_0320
rows.name: But perhaps there's truth in those words.

rows.label: bf05010100_0322
rows.name: After all, he...

rows.label: bf05010100_0324
rows.name: or rather, they...

rows.label: bf05010100_0330
rows.name:
Adel-sama, Laura-sama!
We've discovered Metsu's target!

rows.label: bf05010100_0340
rows.name: It's the capital!

rows.label: bf05010100_0350
rows.name: Is that true?

rows.label: bf05010100_0360
rows.name: Yes! There's no mistake!

rows.label: bf05010100_0500
rows.name: 500 years ago - Resistance Army Camp
